text: The first season of South Park, an American animated sitcom created by Trey Parker and Matt Stone, aired on Comedy Central in the United States between August 13, 1997, and February 25, 1998, consisting of 13 episodes. ==Episodes== No. in series No. in season Title Directed by Written by Original air date Production code U.S. viewers (million) ==References== ==Other websites== * South Park Studios â€“ official website with streaming video of full episodes Category:1997 in television Category:1998 in American television Category:American television seasons Season 1 Category:1990s television seasons Category:1998 television seasons
